subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : Fusion of with . Statement (II) : Manganate ion on electrolytic oxidation in alkaline medium gives

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false

(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
